text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, sadaqahoi xudro ʙo minnatu ozor ʙotil nakuned, hamcun kase, ki moli xudro ʙaroi namoiş dodan ʙa mardum infoq mekunad va ʙa Allohu rūzi qijomat imon nadorad; pas, masali ū hamcun masali sangi sofest, ki rūji on [andake] xok nişastaast; on goh ʙoroni tunde ʙar on mezanad [va hamai xokhoro az sang meşūjad] va onro sof [-u ʙiduni xok] raho mekunad. Onon [rijokoron] az on ci, ki ançom dodaand, cize ʙa dast nameovarand; va Alloh taolo gurūhi kofironro hidojat namekunad
